description:
great studio in the heart of Upper East Side. 

After a busy day in New York City or a long night dancing relax in a warm and quiet home. 

5min form the MET Museum, Central Park, Fricks Museum, Guggenheim, 15 min from Grand Central, Time Square.

studio with one bed and a sofa bed. All amenties available. well furnished and easy access to subway Q, 4, 5, 6. Great restaurant and bar, supermarket, bakery, etc...

Great restaurants, cafe, bar, brunch places, rooftop, central park, met museum, guggenheim, fricks museum, photography museum, harlem, east river,

To easy:

New subway line Q train one block away. 

subway line 4-5-6 express train 4 blocks away.
name: Great Studio in the heart of UES
review: Appartement très propre, bien équipé et avec beaucoup de charme. Idéalement situé dans l'upper east side a 5 min à pieds de la nouvelle ligne de métro Q (jaune)
